text:
@narendramodi @JM_Scindia @BillGates @gatesfoundation Hope you had this in back of your mind that Bill Gates Foundation has a stake in the Wuhan Virology Lab which is alleged to have prepared the #Covid19 virus in Lab. 

Also that his foundation is using Monopolistic ways to jack up the prices of vaccines.
